/usr/bin/gcc   -msse -W -Wall  -O2 -g    CMakeFiles/ex_mouse.dir/ex_mouse.c.o  -o ex_mouse -rdynamic ../lib/liballegro_image.so.5.0.10 ../lib/liballegro_primitives.so.5.0.10 ../lib/liballegro.so.5.0.10 ../lib/liballegro_main.so.5.0.10 ../lib/liballegro_dialog.so.5.0.10 -lpng -lz ../lib/liballegro.so.5.0.10 -lm -lpthread -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lXcursor -lXinerama -lXrandr -lGL -lGLU -lgtk-x11-2.0 -lgdk-x11-2.0 -latk-1.0 -lgio-2.0 -lpangoft2-1.0 -lpangocairo-1.0 -lgdk_pixbuf-2.0 -lcairo -lpango-1.0 -lfreetype -lfontconfig -lgobject-2.0 -lglib-2.0 -lgthread-2.0 -lrt -lglib-2.0 -lgthread-2.0 -lrt -Wl,-rpath,/home/anhong/Downloads/allegro/b/lib
